page.title: 04MONTACUTE
page.content:
{The Phelips Arms} The Phelips Arms, named after the Phelips family who used to live in Montacute House, is privately owned by Mr A.Warner. It offers good food at the bar along with a beer garden.It is situated in the Borough of Montacute. { {The National Trust Gift Shop { }The National Trust Gift Shop is a shop selling gifts and books within the grounds of Montacute House.
{The Kings Arms Restaurant & Hotel} The Kings Arms Restaurant & Hotel is a privately owned business owned by Mr.&.Mrs.Skipper. It has ten bedrooms with the cheapest at Â£45 a night, a restaurant and a bar.It is situated in Bishopston and employs fifteen full time and part time workers. {MORE>
